resources.string: The username must consist of 1 or more letters. No other characters are allowed.
The password must consist of 1 or more alphanumeric characters. No other characters are allowed.
The port number must be in the range 1 to 65535.
The folder to stay within is either invalid \ or nonexistent.
Before SwiFTP can run, a username and password must be set up.

\ Thanks for using SwiFTP! Here are some brief usage instructions. More information can be \ found at http://www.swiftp.org.

\ \ You should have been prompted to enter a username and password when you started SwiFTP \ for the first time. You must use this username and password when accessing the server. \ This information can be changed later by clicking the Setup button from the main screen.\ 

\ \ Look in the /sdcard directory for your music and other files.

\ \ SwiFTP allows you to enable and disable wifi from the main control screen. However, this \ only works if you are using a network that you have connected to before.

\ \ For power and security reasons, it's recommended that the server be stopped after use.

\ \ If you're watching the server log, don't be alarmed by messages about ignored or unrecognized commands, these are normal as \ long as they don't cause undesired behavior.

\ \ SwiFTP is open source, and help with graphic design and non-English translation are badly needed (look \ at that awful icon)! 

\ \ If something is not working the way you expect it to, please report it to me at www.swiftp.org.

\ \ Thanks for using SwiFTP, and look for more improvements soon.

\

\ SwiFTP has encountered the following error: 
\ 
\ %%%Replace_Here%%%
\ 
\ If you think that this error should not have occurred, it would be very helpful if you \ would email swiftp-devel @ googlegroups.com or visit http://www.swiftp.org and report this as a bug (go to the "Issues" \ section).
\ 
\ Thanks very much for your help!
\ 
\ - The SwiFTP team
\
These settings control the behavior of the SwiFTP server. They \ will take effect when the server is started or restarted. They will be saved, but can be \ changed later by pressing the Setup button.
To log in, clients will have to provide this information.
